meanings.definition: A person or thing that gives a particular style or design to something.
meanings.sent1: The styliser added a unique touch to the outfit.
meanings.sent2: She is a talented styliser who transforms plain clothes into fashionable pieces.
meanings.sent3: The quirky styliser turned a simple chair into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity as a styliser breathed life into the room.
meanings.sent5: The styliser's eye for detail made the room feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: To give a particular style or design to something.
meanings.sent1: He will styliser the website to make it more user-friendly.
meanings.sent2: She loves to styliser her photographs with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to styliser the dish with a sprinkle of edible glitter.
meanings.sent4: Her words stylisered the story, making it captivating for the audience.
meanings.sent5: The artist stylisered the mural, turning the wall into a masterpiece.
